title: Rhonda Sherman: The Worm Farmer's Handbook
subtitle: Rhonda Sherman: The Worm Farmer's Handbook
summary:
In this special episode, part of our Women of the Land series with Chelsea Green Publishing, Abby chats with Rhonda Sherman, vermicomposting and recycling queen! Rhonda’s book, ‘The Worm Farmer’s Handbook’ is a fascinating how-to guide, demystifying the science and logistics of the process of vermicomposting, or composting with worms. We were so inspired by Rhonda’s worm wisdom, and loved learning all about how effective worms can be at encouraging microbes and building soil health! Check out the ‘Worms Can Recycle Your Garbage’ fact sheet Rhonda mentions in the interview below. Thanks to Chelsea Green Publishing for supporting this episode.

Rhonda’s ‘Worms Can Recycle Your Garbage’ factsheet:
https://content.ces.ncsu.edu/worms-can-recycle-your-garbage

Our title photo is by Zachary Brooks at Arizona Worm Farm
